thread.title: Axovant Stock Tumbles After Sweeping Leadership Changes

author: Imani Moise
title: Axovant Stock Tumbles After Sweeping Leadership Changes
text:
Axovant Sciences Ltd. made sweeping changes to its top ranks Monday as the company struggles to regain its footing after abandoning its banner Alzheimerâ€™s drug.
Shares plunged 20% to $1.54 during morning trading, and are down 88% from a year ago.
Chief Executive David Hung has resigned after 10 months in his role, but will continue to serve... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
